column1: BrickPiet44,"2008-10-01T15:20:13.357Z","All time favorite","I often wondered why a fire station should have an ambulance and a tow truck. But after a visit to Legoland Billund I understood: fire services and road service were in Denmark with the same organisation. So after thirty years of so that was cleared.
The set has a simple garage with basic vehicles.
The fire truck has a ladder and opening doors, but the ladder cannot turn around. The ambulance is a converted station wagon. But not with stickers but decorated bricks. That's a great plus.
The tow truck is, well, basic too.

But it is the combination that makes this set my all time favorite. Three different cars are a guarantee for great playability. It takes only a few other cars and / or houses to have a complete Lego town. It's possible to play all kind of different events. OK, the flag has been broken a few times. But the tree still stands. In essence this set is a fire station, a hospital and a garage in one. ",FALSE,5,0,0,0,0
